tool_description: Exports annotations in various formats (COCO, YOLO, Pascal VOC, CSV) with customizable filtering and format-specific configurations for training and deployment.

export_format.description: Target export format: COCO, YOLO, PASCAL_VOC, CSV, or JSON

output_path.description: File or directory path for exported annotations

image_ids.description: Specific image IDs to export (empty means all)

class_filter.description: Filter by specific class names (empty means all classes)

min_confidence.description: Minimum confidence threshold for exported annotations

include_difficult.description: Whether to include annotations marked as difficult

normalize_coordinates.description: Whether to normalize coordinates to 0-1 range (YOLO format)

error_messages: Invalid project_id: Project identifier must exist and be non-empty. Verify project_id is correct.
Unsupported export_format: Format must be one of [COCO, YOLO, PASCAL_VOC, CSV, JSON]. Check export_format value.
Invalid output_path: Path must be writable and accessible. Verify directory exists and permissions are correct.
Invalid image_ids: One or more image IDs do not exist in the project. Check all image IDs are valid.
Invalid class_filter: One or more class names do not exist in project configuration. Verify class names.
Invalid min_confidence: Confidence threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive. Adjust min_confidence value.
Invalid split_ratio: Array must contain exactly 3 positive numbers that sum to 1.0. Check split_ratio values.
No annotations to export: No annotations match the specified filters. Adjust filtering parameters.
usage: Provide project_id, export_format, and output_path. Optionally filter by image_ids, class_filter, and min_confidence. Configure format-specific options like normalize_coordinates and split_ratio. Returns export statistics and file locations.

total_images.description: Number of images included in export

class_distribution.description: Distribution of classes in exported data
